        public ResourceCache findById(java.lang.String path,

        Searches for a single ResourceCache object given a URL encoded ID string.

        Parameters:
        path - The URL encoded path to look for.
        id - The ID to look for.
        Returns:
        The requested ResourceCache as an object.

      • copy

        public ResultMessage copy(java.lang.String path,
                 java.lang.String ids)

        Copies one or more resource caches in a resource cache module.

        Parameters:
        path - The path to the resource cache module.
        ids - The a comma separated list of resource cache IDs to copy.
        Returns:
        A message or messages with the result of the operation.

        ids - The a comma separated list of resource cache IDs to delete.
